Package lib.homies.framework.utils

Interface ItemBuilder

All Known Implementing Classes:
SpigotItemBuilder
public interface ItemBuilder
A platform-agnostic interface for building HomiesItemStacks. This builder provides a fluent API to construct items with various properties.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ItemBuilder
    amount(int amount)
    Sets the amount of the item stack.
    HomiesItemStack
    build()
    Builds and returns the constructed HomiesItemStack.

    Adds an enchantment to the item.
    ItemBuilder

    Adds item flags to hide certain attributes (e.g., enchantments, attributes).

    Sets the lore (description lines) of the item.

  • Method Details

    • amount

      ItemBuilder amount(int amount)
      Sets the amount of the item stack.
      Parameters:
      amount - The number of items in the stack.
      Returns:
      The ItemBuilder instance for chaining.

    • name

      ItemBuilder name(String displayName)
      Sets the display name of the item. Color codes are typically supported and handled by the underlying platform implementation.
      Parameters:
      displayName - The display name of the item.
      Returns:
      The ItemBuilder instance for chaining.

    • lore

      ItemBuilder lore(String... lines)
      Sets the lore (description lines) of the item. Color codes are typically supported and handled by the underlying platform implementation.
      Parameters:
      lines - An array of strings representing the lore lines.
      Returns:
      The ItemBuilder instance for chaining.

    • enchant

      ItemBuilder enchant(String enchantment, int level)
      Adds an enchantment to the item.
      Parameters:
      enchantment - The name of the enchantment (e.g., "SHARPNESS", "PROTECTION").
      level - The level of the enchantment.
      Returns:
      The ItemBuilder instance for chaining.

    • flag

      ItemBuilder flag(String... flags)
      Adds item flags to hide certain attributes (e.g., enchantments, attributes).
      Parameters:
      flags - An array of strings representing the item flags (e.g., "HIDE_ENCHANTS", "HIDE_ATTRIBUTES").
      Returns:
      The ItemBuilder instance for chaining.

    • setPlayerProfile

      ItemBuilder setPlayerProfile(HomiesPlayerProfile profile)
      Sets the player profile for skull items. This is typically used for player heads to display a specific player's skin.
      Parameters:
      profile - The HomiesPlayerProfile to set for the skull.
      Returns:
      The ItemBuilder instance for chaining.

    • build

      HomiesItemStack build()
      Builds and returns the constructed HomiesItemStack.
      Returns:
      The final HomiesItemStack.
